detectors.description: TicketsStorage.findHappyNumber(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x30829351fc81174b63f696dc12d91405a9b78a08-SundayLottery.sol#405-416) uses a weak PRNG: happyNumber > countTickets[round] (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x30829351fc81174b63f696dc12d91405a9b78a08-SundayLottery.sol#411)

TicketsStorage.findHappyNumber(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x30829351fc81174b63f696dc12d91405a9b78a08-SundayLottery.sol#405-416) uses a weak PRNG: tickets[round][happyNumber].winnerRound > 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x30829351fc81174b63f696dc12d91405a9b78a08-SundayLottery.sol#408)

TicketsStorage.maxRandom(uint256,address) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x30829351fc81174b63f696dc12d91405a9b78a08-SundayLottery.sol#430-436) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(blockn),entropy))) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x30829351fc81174b63f696dc12d91405a9b78a08-SundayLottery.sol#431-435)
